oai_dc:dc.dc:title: When good fellows get together [microform] /
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Bennett, James O'Donnell, 1870-1940.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Collection of poems and short essays.
."'Gallants, lads, boys, hearts of gold, all the titles of good-fellowship come to you'-Shakespeare."
Filmed from a copy of the original publication held by the Ottawa Public Library.
